mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_type_goods SET update_by = #{userId}, update_date = #{updateDate}, status = 0, del_flag = 0 WHERE office_id = #{officeId} and id = #{id} and del_flag = 1
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_type_goods a LEFT JOIN tbl_office b ON a.office_id = b.id where type_name LIKE '%#{goodsName}%'
